channel.title: Fool and psychic interaction
channel.description: So I am relatively new to this game and am unsure if an interaction is intended or a bug so thought I would ask here. I was psychic and use my ability to type psychic link and the fool trollboxed me. Is the trollbox supposed to be able to appear as a psychic link in this case if I didn't send a message first?

item.title: Fool and psychic interaction
item.dc:creator: robflop
item.description:
Lemme know if you want to re-open it with a reason as to why

Read full topic

item.title: Fool and psychic interaction
item.dc:creator: robflop
item.description:
This is fixed in the latest patch, according to Bos.

Read full topic

item.title: Fool and psychic interaction
item.dc:creator: Loudo
item.description:
I remember watching a video on YouTube where the same thing happened.

The YouTuber was a Fool and he trollboxed the Psychic while he was typing his message for Telepathy. The trollboxed message appeared as the Psychic’s telepathic message but was invisible to all players except for the Fool himself (and possibly the Psychic, as you are confirming).

I’m guessing this is a bug and not the intended effect.

Read full topic

item.title: Fool and psychic interaction
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Oh ok. That ability is called telepathy and i am not sure what should happen there.

Read full topic

item.title: Fool and psychic interaction
item.dc:creator: kylundstrom92
item.description:
I meant the day ability that allows the psychic to talk to everyone without coming out sorry for any confusion.

Read full topic

item.title: Fool and psychic interaction
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
no. Psychic link is at night while trollbox is in the day.

Read full topic
